name: The Blood Curse
description:
Made for Mini Jam 118: Vampire

The Blood Curse

Once Upon a Time, corpse of a person named Fripp came back to life from the dead because he was cursed to become a vampire.

But his body refuses to become a vampire and he begins his journey to Sinfield's castle to find the cure.

Controls

- move [arrow] or [W] [A] [S] [D]

- jump [Z] or [J]

- switch mode [C] or [L]

- attack [X] or [K]

- restart level [R]

Credits

MFauzan - programming & art

David Bock - music & sfx

ZX Origins & JackOatley - fonts

Known bugs

- player will get softlock by restarting the level in blood mode
